vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.4.17;
son of: Obed (H5744);
father of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Raddai (H7288), Ozem (H0684), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)
Also named: Iessai<\i> (Ἰεσσαί "Jesse" G2421)
§ Jesse = "I possess"
son of Boaz and the father of king David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Obed; padre de David; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶西 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "我擁有"
波阿斯的後裔, 大衛王的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶西 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "我拥有"
波阿斯的后裔, 大卫王的父亲
